! all lengths and dimensions in cm
! scales are relative to default font height hei=0.3633 cm

graphWidth = 20
graphHeight = graphWidth/ratio

titleDist = 0.5
titleScale = 1.8
axisLabelDist = 0.5
axisLabelScale = 1.5
axisTitleDist = axisLabelDist+titleDist
axisTitleScale = 1.8

axisWidth = 0.07
lineWidth = 0.07
markerSize = 0.15

keyHei = 0.45
keyDist = 0.15
keyMargins = 0.2
keyLineLength = 0.7
keyColDist = 0.5
